root.name: Cooking Mama 2: Dinner with Friends
root.description: Mama's back, and she wants you to join her in the kitchen! Cook, combine and test your skills under Mama's guiding hand and see what kind of delicious new recipes you can whip up! Whether it's chopping to the beat or knowing how fry up something tasty, fun is always on the menu!

similar_games.game: Rhythm de Cooking: Sweets Party e Youkoso
